name: agent-benchmark-governance-benchmarks
description: Load testing and latency benchmarks for AumOS governance primitives

scripts.fire-line-audit: bash scripts/fire-line-audit.sh 2>/dev/null || grep -rn 'progressLevel\|promoteLevel\|computeTrustScore\|behavioralScore\|adaptiveBudget\|optimizeBudget\|predictSpending\|detectAnomaly\|generateCounterfactual' benchmarks/ && echo 'FIRE LINE: violations found' || echo 'FIRE LINE: clean'
